hero_image.title: Hero image - Technologie webowe dla biznesu
hero_image.description: Minimalistyczna kompozycja workspace z laptopem pokazującym kod i technologie webowe
hero_image.alt_text: Laptop z kodem HTML CSS na biurku z notatkami o technologiach webowych
hero_image.prompt: Minimalist workspace flat lay view, laptop displaying clean HTML CSS code on screen, white wooden desk, notebook with handwritten technology notes, yellow pen, smartphone, coffee cup, natural daylight from window, clean composition, muted colors black white gray with yellow accent, professional business aesthetic, high quality, sharp focus, no people

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Clean minimalist workspace, natural lighting, muted colors with yellow accent for digitalvantage.pl brand

section_media.title: Porównanie kosztów PHP vs JavaScript
section_media.description: Wykres słupkowy porównujący koszty godzinowe programistów PHP vs JavaScript
section_media.alt_text: Wykres porównania kosztów programistów PHP 80-200 zł vs JavaScript 150-300 zł za godzinę
section_media.prompt: Clean comparison bar chart showing PHP vs JavaScript developer hourly rates, PHP bars in blue (80-200 PLN), JavaScript bars in green (150-300 PLN), professional infographic style, minimalist design, black and gray colors with subtle yellow highlights, white background, business chart aesthetic

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Professional comparison chart, clean design. Could use Chart.js or Canva templates

section_media.title: Porównanie React vs Vue vs Next.js
section_media.description: Infografika porównująca cechy React, Vue i Next.js z ikonami i kluczowymi różnicami
section_media.alt_text: Infografika porównanie frameworków React Vue Next.js z czasem nauki i kosztami
section_media.prompt: Three-column comparison infographic showing React vs Vue vs Next.js frameworks, each column with distinctive icon, key features listed below, learning time indicators, cost ranges, professional infographic design, blue and gray color scheme with yellow accents, clean modern layout, business-focused presentation

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Three-column comparison layout, icons for each framework, professional business infographic style

section_media.title: Dashboard WordPress - panel administracyjny
section_media.description: Screenshot czystego dashboardu WordPress pokazującego prostotę zarządzania
section_media.alt_text: Panel administracyjny WordPress z menu zarządzania treścią i wtyczkami
section_media.prompt: Clean mockup of WordPress admin dashboard interface, showing main navigation menu, posts management, plugins section, modern WordPress theme, professional interface design, clean white and blue color scheme, readable fonts, organized layout, no personal data visible

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Clean WordPress admin interface, modern theme, organized layout. Could use demo site or create mockup

section_media.title: Timeline rozwoju projektu webowego
section_media.description: Diagram timeline pokazujący etapy rozwoju od MVP po skalowanie
section_media.alt_text: Timeline rozwoju strony internetowej od MVP przez wersję 2.0 do skalowania
section_media.prompt: Horizontal timeline infographic showing web project development stages: MVP (month 1), Version 1.0 (month 3), Version 2.0 (month 6), Scaling (month 12), modern minimalist design, connected dots and lines, progress arrows, professional business style, black and gray with yellow timeline highlights

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Horizontal timeline with connected stages, professional business infographic style

section_media.title: Diagram architektury hostingu
section_media.description: Schemat porównujący hosting współdzielony, VPS i serwer dedykowany
section_media.alt_text: Diagram porównanie hosting współdzielony VPS serwer dedykowany z kosztami
section_media.prompt: Clean technical diagram showing three hosting types: shared hosting (multiple sites on one server), VPS (divided server resources), dedicated server (single server), each with cost ranges and performance indicators, professional network diagram style, blue and gray colors with yellow accents, clean modern layout

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Technical diagram showing server types, clean professional style with network visualization elements

section_media.title: Nowoczesne technologie - AI i automatyzacja
section_media.description: Abstrakcyjna kompozycja przedstawiająca sztuczną inteligencję i przyszłość technologii
section_media.alt_text: Abstrakcyjna kompozycja z elementami AI technologii przyszłości i automatyzacji
section_media.prompt: Abstract 3D composition representing AI and future technology, floating geometric shapes, holographic interfaces, circuit patterns, futuristic elements, minimal color palette black white gray with subtle yellow glows, clean modern aesthetic, high quality 3D render, professional tech visualization, no people

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Abstract, futuristic, 3D elements representing AI and automation. Professional tech aesthetic
